# All AI crawlers, scrapers, and training systems are blocked.
User-agent: *
Disallow: /

# === EXPLICIT BLOCKS FOR KNOWN AI CRAWLERS ===
User-agent: GPTBot
Disallow: /

Disallow: /

Disallow: /

Disallow: /

Disallow: /

Disallow: /

Disallow: /

Disallow: /

Disallow: /

User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Disallow: /
